Posts.Content: Jul 19, 2015 08:36PM addielou wrote: Hey there, just wanted to chime in and say i am going through the exact same thing. When i lay flat the bottom part of my left breast sinks in and pulls my nipple inwards. when i stand up normal its not really noticeable unless i run my fingers across it. its almost as if its empty right there. the other one feels normal and full. my dr was concerned and i too am waiting for my appt at the breast center. i just keep googling trying to find a pic that looks like mine or answers. google is not my friend. prayers to you. we are not alone.
Posts.Title: Dent almost entirely through breast charlieb34 addielou
